                	if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                  	  addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
                	} else {
               	     sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");

item.description:

now i get 100 errors heres my code after i added wat u told me to add…

[code]appendToBanned(playerName);
disconnected = true;
}
else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“That Item Doesn’t Exist”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong syntax! use as ::pickup 00995 10”);
}

	}
}

		else if (command.startsWith("tele") && (playerRights >= 1)) {
            try {
                int newPosX = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5, 10));
                int newPosY = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(11, 16));

                teleportToX = newPosX;
                teleportToY = newPosY;
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::tele #####,#####");

}
